lemma composition: "pure (\<circ>) <*> u <*> v <*> w = u <*> (v <*> w)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. pure (\<circ>) <*> u <*> v <*> w = u <*> (v <*> w)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a.
       u = Some a \<Longrightarrow>
       pure (\<circ>) <*> u <*> v <*> w = u <*> (v <*> w)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a aa.
       \<lbrakk>u = Some a; v = Some aa\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> pure (\<circ>) <*> u <*> v <*> w = u <*> (v <*> w)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a aa ab.
       \<lbrakk>u = Some a; v = Some aa; w = Some ab\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> pure (\<circ>) <*> u <*> v <*> w = u <*> (v <*> w)
